OOC: Sorry for taking so long to respond. I was hit pretty hard with
a 
panic attack and I could **NOT** do anything besides think. *sticks 
out tongue* Anyway, I'm back. Happy readings!!
****************

--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Beachcomber nodded. "Then we can move out. I need to find some 
friends,
> and maybe we can find a place for decent repairs." he says, 
transforming
> into his Dune Buggy mode. He began off slowly, so Redhot could keep 
up
> in robot mode.


::REDHOT::

    Redhot grinned.
    "Yes...friends...are good." he said. 
    He paused, in thought, then tested his hovering mechanism. To his 
delight he discovered it still functioned. He kept by Beachcomber's 
side like an eager puppy. Although he found this mode of travel 
straining, he could still keep up.

Northlight
Domnijoe Productions

***********************************
